tool_description: Checks the current execution status of specific backup jobs, including progress, completion state, and basic error information.

job_name.description: Name of the backup job to check

database_type.description: Database system type (mysql, postgresql, oracle, sqlserver, mongodb)

connection_string.description: Database connection string with authentication details

timeout_seconds.description: Maximum time to wait for status response

error_messages: Job not found: Verify the job_name exists in the specified database system.
Connection timeout: Check network connectivity and increase timeout_seconds if needed.
Status query failed: Database system may be unresponsive or job metadata corrupted.
Access denied: Insufficient permissions to query job status information.
usage: Provide job_name, database_type, and connection_string to get current job status. Adjust timeout_seconds for slow-responding systems.

status.description: Current job status (running, completed, failed, waiting, unknown)

error_message.description: Error message if job failed, empty string otherwise
